raw_snippet: visionaries who helped to build the industrial city out of the ashes of of Erin Tarn destruction. However, unlike his forefathers, Karl Prosek is a vicious opportunist who sees the opportunity to create a family dynasty and has seized that opportunity. The introduction from The Great Historian Erin Tarn's book, Perhaps it is from my position as a historian that I can see the HUMANKIND'S RISE FROM CHAOS, circa 63 P.A. progression of events as something far more dangerous than others around me can. I see the wheels of an oppressing dictatorship turning I have taken it upon myself to capture human history before it is and gathering momentum. It is classic.
